resources.string: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسْتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself.
I can do it, and I will
نقاوم ما نحب ونتحمل ما نكره
Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.
